original: 丹陽人，東吳官吏。正史中所載不多，且多僅提及其名。曾為孫權太子孫登的賓客，後出使蜀漢時，攜回了司馬徽關於讖文預言的相關著作。
text: Danyang, the official of the Eastern Wu. There are not many in the official history, and only the name is mentioned. Once a guest of Sun Quan, the prince Sun Deng, he brought back Sima Hui's works on prophecy prophecy when he later went to Shuhan.
